sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez présenter votre carte d'identité.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please show your ID card.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Hěn duō rén guānzhù zhège huàtí.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Beaucoup de gens suivent ce sujet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Many people pay attention to this topic.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 自从毕业后，我们就没见过面。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zìcóng bìyè hòu, wǒmen jiù méi jiànguò miàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Depuis la fin de nos études, nous ne nous sommes pas revus.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: We haven't seen each other since graduation.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette chambre est très propre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This room is very clean.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Voyons-nous la semaine prochaine.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's meet next week.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je vais sur internet tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I go online every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Bié shēngqì, wǒ zhǐshì kāi wánxiào.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ne te fâche pas, je plaisantais.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Don't be angry, I was just joking.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai oublié d'apporter mes clés.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I forgot to bring my keys.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Veuillez attendre un moment.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Please wait a moment.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La santé est la chose la plus importante.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Health is the most important thing.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Tu dois terminer tes devoirs à temps.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: You must finish your homework on time.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā de kǎoshì chéngjì hěn hǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ses résultats d'examen sont très bons.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: His exam results are very good.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le problème est soudainement apparu.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The problem suddenly appeared.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle est la signification de ce mot ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What is the meaning of this word?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo kùzi tài duǎn le.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pantalon est trop court.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These pants are too short.

sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je prends le métro pour aller au travail tous les jours.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I take the subway to work every day.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Jīntiān de tiānqì duōme hǎo a!
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quel beau temps il fait aujourd'hui !
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What nice weather it is today!

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè duàn lù hěn nán zǒu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce tronçon de route est difficile à parcourir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This section of the road is difficult to travel.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fāxiàn le yī gè mìmì.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a découvert un secret.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He discovered a secret.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 让我们总结一下今天的讨论。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Ràng wǒmen zǒngjié yīxià jīntiān de tǎolùn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Résumons la discussion d'aujourd'hui.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Let's summarize today's discussion.
